info.title: ReelNet API
info.description: RESTful API for the ReelNet application

tags.name: Public Metrics
tags.description: API endpoints for public application metrics

tags.name: Vocabulary Sets
tags.description: API endpoints for managing vocabulary sets

get.description: Retrieves a vocabulary set by its ID if the user has access to it

put.description: Updates an existing vocabulary set if the user has access to it

delete.description: Deletes a vocabulary set if the user has access to it

get.description: Retrieves all vocabulary sets with pagination, filtering and searching

post.description: Creates a new vocabulary set with the provided information

get.description: Retrieves all recently used vocabulary sets
Returns basic application metrics such as request count, error rate, and system load
Returns more detailed metrics suitable for user dashboards

id.description: Unique identifier of the vocabulary set

createdBy.description: ID of the user who created the vocabulary set

visibility.description: Visibility level of the vocabulary set

difficultyLevel.description: Difficulty level of the vocabulary set

vocabularyCount.description: Number of vocabularies in the set
